Name: Baba Yaga
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with a Cursed Pestle.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.
When this model attempts to Cast a Magic Spell add 5 to the result.

At the start of the fight phase select 1 enemy Formation within 1" of this model, then roll 3D6 for each other enemy Formation within 3" of the selected Formation. For each result of 4+ the Formation being rolled for suffers D3 ethereal damage.

Spells.Name: A Feast for Twelve (40)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 12" of this model containing 6 or more models and roll 6D6. For each result of 4+ the Formation suffers D3 ethereal damage. If the selected Formation contains 12 or more models, then roll 12D6 instead.

Spells.Name: The Curse of Baba Yaga (35)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 12" of this model and have the selected Formation perform 3 strength checks. For each failed strength test the selected Formation suffers D6 ethereal damage.
